name: Perpetua (MarcelArioli)
description:
Perpetua

Perpetua is a node based coding game, where you will help a little robot to fullfill his tasks. The game originated as my bachelor degree project within 3 months of work, all from scratch. 

In this game, you will connect nodes together to execute code, it's all visual, you don't code a single line. The challenge is to solve the riddles with as few nodes as possible. 

Perpetua is just a prototype, containing 5 small levels that each explain another node and a final challenge to test your skills. so make sure to play all 6 levels if you think its to easy. 

I'm not interested in money here but the more in feedback ! please let me know everything you like or dislike about the game ! Because : Currently I'm itterating on the ideas and will start a new project based on perpetua if the response of the community is positive.
